comparisons.title: La meilleure souris haut de gamme
comparisons.product: Full product name (e.g., Logitech G Pro X Superlight 2)
comparisons.description: Write a short paragraph (~100 words) explaining why this is the best high-end product overall. Describe its top-tier performance, premium build, advanced features, and who it’s best suited for.
comparisons.paragraph1: Describe the product’s ergonomics and design in detail.
comparisons.paragraph2: Explain which hand sizes and grip styles the product is best suited for.
comparisons.paragraph3: Detail the number of buttons, their placement, and usability.
comparisons.paragraph4: Analyze the price and how it compares to alternatives.
comparisons.note: Write 3–4 paragraphs covering all points above, but not in a fixed order. Combine topics naturally where it makes sense.
